movies.title: The Lion King
movies.overview: A young lion prince is cast out of his pride by his cruel uncle, who claims he killed his father.

movies.title: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
movies.overview: Human child Mowgli is raised by a wolf pack in the jungles of India.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.overview: Dr. Stephen Strange's (Benedict Cumberbatch) life changes after a car accident robs him of the use of his hands.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.overview: Legendary assassin John Wick (Keanu Reeves) retired from his violent career after marrying the love of his life
